typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EnqueuedTimeUtc as string,
		Properties as [string,string],
		SystemProperties as [string,string],
		Body as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		PiData = Body
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> JsonValue
JsonValue parse(PiData = PiData ? (deviceId as string,
		temperature as long,
		humidity as long),
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> ParseJSON
ParseJSON select(mapColumn(
		deviceId = PiData.deviceId,
		temperature = PiData.temperature,
		humidity = PiData.humidity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> GetJsonFields
JsonValue sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'IOTData',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
GetJsonFields sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	store: 'sqlserver',
	schemaName: 'dbo',
	tableName: 'IoTDataDetail',
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	deletable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
